title: Finance Intern
content:
Finance Intern
As a Finance Intern, you'll learn and help in daily routines related to accounts payable, accounts receivable and cash management. You'll work closely and support the team to:
 
Activities related to accounts payable (control, recording, issuance of NFTs);Activities related to accounts receivable (issuance of invoices and collection);Activities related to cash flow (daily and monthly position);Control and management of reimbursements and corporate credit card;Support for internal and external customers;Support external and internal audit and controlling team.
 

Your Skills And Experiences

You are passionate about the world of online advertising, new media and you want to have a first experience in video and new advertising formats on the web.
Currently studying Business Administration, Economics, Accounting or similar
You are rigorous, organized and autonomous.
You demonstrate a good sense of analysis.
You have some business sense and good relationship skills
You have intermediate knowledge of Microsoft Office
Intermediate English level is mandatory


 ===== ABOUT TEADS ======
Teads operates a leading, cloud-based, end-to-end technology platform that enables programmatic digital advertising across a global ecosystem of quality digital media. As an end-to-end solution, Teads’ modular platform allows partners to leverage buy-side, sell-side, creative, data and AI optimization technologies.For advertisers and their agencies, Teads offers a single access point to buy the inventory of many of the world’s best publishers. Through exclusive global media partnerships, Teads enables advertisers and agencies to reach 1.9 billion unique monthly users* in brand safe, responsible advertising environments, while improving the effectiveness and efficiency of digital ad transactions.Teads partners with the leading marketers, agencies and publishers through a team of 1000+ people in 30 countries.
We're committed to creating a dynamic work environment that values diversity and inclusion, and represents employees across a variety of skill sets. We embrace contributions from all ages, sexes, races, ethnicities, religions, sexual orientations and gender identities.
